page.title: 03Denmead Family's Day (Cont.)
page.content: This is how our Denmead family's day continues: 8:40-3:20p.m. Normal teaching day at school. 3:20-4:00p.m. Drive home. Pick up baby. 4:00p.m. Either play with baby/ visit friends/shop in Waterlooville/prepare meal or read mail. 5:00-6:00p.m. Husband returns and plays with baby. 6:00p.m. Watch B.B.C. News. 6:30-7:00p.m. Bath baby and put to bed. 7:00-8:00p.m. Eat dinner and clear up. 8:00-11:00p.m. Either schoolwork/ housework/garden/watch T.V./visit friends or keep fit (once a week). 11:00-11:30p.m. Shower and bed. N.B. Housework mainly done at weekend.
